item.title: Wednesday December 13 2017
item.description: Kawhi Leonard has returned from injury. President Trump has signed a bill that exceeds the currently authorized level of $549 billion. A former SAISD official faces bribery-related charges. A legendary Tejano artist will perform in San Antonio for New Years Eve. Alabama is set to have it's first Senator from the Democratic Party in 25 years. This and more in today's Express Briefing, brought to you by the San Antonio Express-News and ExpressNews.com
item.content:encoded: Kawhi Leonard has returned from injury. President Trump has signed a bill that exceeds the currently authorized level of $549 billion. A former SAISD official faces bribery-related charges. A legendary Tejano artist will perform in San Antonio for New Years Eve. Alabama is set to have it's first Senator from the Democratic Party in 25 years. This and more in today's Express Briefing, brought to you by the San Antonio Express-News and ExpressNews.com

item.title: Tuesday December 12 2017
item.description: The Flying L Ranch may be headed for foreclosure. An actor with ties to the San Antonio area has received a best supporting actor nod. Candidates are lining up for Lamar Smith's congressional seat and to challenge Will Hurd. And after decades of coverup by the Catholic Church, a Priest has been convicted of murder. This and more in today's Express Briefing, brought to you by the San Antonio Express-News and ExpressNews.com.
item.content:encoded: The Flying L Ranch may be headed for foreclosure. An actor with ties to the San Antonio area has received a best supporting actor nod. Candidates are lining up for Lamar Smith's congressional seat and to challenge Will Hurd. And after decades of coverup by the Catholic Church, a Priest has been convicted of murder. This and more in today's Express Briefing, brought to you by the San Antonio Express-News and ExpressNews.com.

item.title: Thursday November 2 2017
item.description: The Houston Astros capture their first World Series title, DA Nico LaHood has a new challenge, a major financial services firm has plans for San Antonio, and Kawhi Leonard is unlikely to play as the Spurs host the Warriors. This and more in today's Express Briefing, presented by the San Antonio Express-News. This episode is brought to you by [company]
item.content:encoded: The Houston Astros capture their first World Series title, DA Nico LaHood has a new challenge, a major financial services firm has plans for San Antonio, and Kawhi Leonard is unlikely to play as the Spurs host the Warriors. This and more in today's Express Briefing, presented by the San Antonio Express-News. This episode is brought to you by [company]
